title: Pixel 2 locked after transferring data to Pixel 4a
content:
After I transferred my data to a new Pixel 4a from my old Pixel 2, when o try to unlock my old phone, Pixel 2, it says that the pattern is wrong. And I know for sure it isn't. 

Problem is that I still have some really really important Recorder audios which, apparently, weren't transferred (wtf!). So, I can't wipe out the device. Unfortunately I did a restart already and reset via Google Device Manager doesn't find the device (can I connect to WiFi/mobile data without unlocking)

I tried an OTA reinstall via adb, but it didn't change anything. I was hoping that it would recognise the corrupted pattern flow.

Fingerprint is enabled on Pixel 2, but pattern lock is still asked for when opening the phone.
